tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. Namrita Sheregar throughout my pregnancy journey, and I can confidently say that she is nothing short of amazing. Her excellent patient relations, knowledge, and professionalism made my pregnancy experience delightful.

From my very first visit, Dr. Namrita made me feel welcomed and answered all my queries. As an anxious person, she could sense my apprehensions and always calmed me down. She is a true professional and a non-judgmental gynecologist. I could openly discuss all my fears and concerns with her, and she not only consulted me but also provided counseling and put me at ease.

Dr. Namrita‚Äôs special interest in high-risk obstetrics was evident in her approach. She was available for calls even at 1 AM, ensuring that I felt supported throughout. Her guidance during my delivery was invaluable, and I delivered my baby boy under her care.

I highly recommend Dr. Namrita Sheregar to anyone seeking compassionate and expert gynecological and obstetric care. Thank you, Dr. Namrita, for making my pregnancy journey memorable and reassuring!

If you‚Äôre looking for a gynecologist who truly cares about her patients, Dr. Namrita Sheregar is an excellent choice

review: I had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. Namita throughout my pregnancy journey, and I can confidently say that she is nothing short of amazing. From the moment I walked into her clinic, I felt welcomed and at ease.Dr. Namita possesses a wealth of knowledge and expertise that she generously shared with me. She patiently addressed all of my queries and concerns, ensuring I was well-informed every step of the way. Her ability to explain complex medical concepts in a clear and compassionate manner made me feel empowered and confident in my decisions.When it came time for my C-section delivery, Dr. Namita's skill and professionalism truly shone. She and her team ensured that the entire process was smooth and as stress-free as possible. Her dedication to my well-being and that of my baby was evident throughout, and I couldn't have asked for a better advocate during this crucial time.What sets Dr. Namita apart is not only her medical competence but also her genuine care and empathy. She goes above and beyond to make her patients feel valued and supported. Her post-delivery care was exceptional, and I always felt like I had a trusted partner on this incredible journey into motherhood.I cannot thank Dr. Namita enough for the incredible care she provided during my pregnancy and delivery. She is a true gem and I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking compassionate, expert, and personalized care. Thank you, Dr. Namita, for helping make my pregnancy and delivery experience so positive and memorable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Pregnancy is an exciting time‚Äîbut it can also be overwhelming. With all the doctor‚Äôs appointments to attend, remembering to eat healthy and to avoid risky behaviors, new mother books to read ‚Äîthere‚Äôs a lot to keep in mind. And then comes parenthood‚Äîvaccination schedules, regular doctor appointments, concerns about what to do during a cough or a fever and growth percentiles‚Ä¶ parents have a lot on their plate.

There is much more to this relationship and the type of communications that occur however. For instance, doctor-patient communication during pregnancy is especially delicate because of the frequent and intimate interactions patients have with their doctors ‚Äì not to mention the prenatal emotions and health behaviors that have significant effects on birth outcomes. This is further complicated by the nature of prenatal care, where patients may see multiple doctors within the same practice, or see one doctor during pregnancy but another during delivery, because doctors and patients may not have as much time to get to know each other. e internet for advice. It is simply too easy to assume a certain diagnosis based off of the internet that may not actually be the case.
reply_text: Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I will start by saying Thank you Dr. Namrita for making my pregnancy journey a delightful experience. I delivered my baby girl in November under her guidance and the experience has been just amazing. Being new to Mumbai, when I came to know about my pregnancy, my first job was to find a gynaecologist and luckily I decided to visit Dr. Namrita. On my first visit itself she made me feel so welcomed and answered all my queries. I am an anxious person; without even telling her, she could feel it from my voice and calmed me down whenever required. She is knowledgeable, a true professional and a non judgemental Gynecologist. I could discuss all my fears and apprehensions with her openly. She not only consulted me but also counseled me and put me at ease. Always available on calls even at 1 AM at night. I will 100% recommend her.

review: I was having heavy bleeding for more than a month. *** ****** **** ********* * *********** I was eventually diagnosed with a cyst when I went for a second consultation. Would not recommend
reply_text: You had bleeding following consumption of hormonal pills the nature of which I don‚Äôt want to disclose publicly. You had a recent sonography report. Hence I didn‚Äôt ask you to repeat it as I do not believe in doing unnecessary repeated investigations. We treat patients and not reports. If you did not get relief from your complaints, you should have followed up. You could have been given some alternative treatment as it is not necessary that a particular treatment works for every patient .
